member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.PdfExporter
member.summary: Exports MindFusion reports to Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF) files.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the PdfExporter class.

member.summary: Creates a PDF file representing the specified report.
member.param: A reference to the report that will be exported.
The full path to the PDF file.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.PdfExporter.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the page size.
